text: Super people working there; I went fot my supervised ART test; though I was not booked in they explained how to do it while being straight to the point. Do come here for that and the other services they offer.

First time here and Dr Fong served me. He is, unquestionably, the best dentist i ever had. He was sincere in his approach. He even took it on to himself to educate me to see dental care as something long-term rather than something that should occur whenever there is something to be fixed. For something as trivia as filling, he explained to me in great details on how to take care of it for years to come. He also told me what to tell other dentists to prevent misdiagnosis and damages to my teeth.
Good service from the doctor and dentist is very patient to check teeth health. The nurse there is very friendly!
My dentist was so thorough and carefully walked me through everything. Super happy with the experience!
Very good, professional, sincere and friendly service, both by GP and dentist.
